# W6899-240136 Asphalt Repairs - Greenwood
## Solicitation Information
* **Reference Number**: WS4566482635-Doc4566485766
* **Solicitation Number**: WS4566482635
* **Tender Closing Date and Time**: 2024-06-04, 2:00 PM EST
* **Publication Date**: 2024-05-07
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price

## Project Description
This solicitation is for Asphalt Repairs services at the Greenwood location. The successful contractor will be responsible for the provision of all labour, material, and equipment required to complete the work in accordance with the project specifications.

## Geographical Extent
This project is limited to the Province of Nova Scotia.

## Sourcing Information
* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Procuring Entity**: Department of National Defence (DND)

## Bidding Process
Inquiries of a technical nature and all questions of a contractual nature must be submitted to the Contracting Authority in writing at Dylon.Leonard@pwgsc-tpsgc.gc.ca.

## Trade Agreements

This solicitation is open to the following trade agreements:
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
